title: RAMEN SCHOOL #7 | How to Make Garlic Shoyu Ramen | 醬油ラーメン
description:
Shoyu ramen is one of the 4 basic ramen styles (along with shio, tonkotsu and miso) It’s a Tokyo style of ramen that uses soy sauce as the salty and umami base of the tare. Here’s how to make it.

Get the full recipe here: http://adamliaw.com/recipe/ramen-school-007-garlic-shoyu-ramen/
For more like this, follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/adamliaw/
